---
title: "Boxplot"
author: "IJL & HH"
date: "2022-09-26"
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}


library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
data("data_run_2")
glimpse(data_run_2)

ggplot(data = data_run_2, mapping = aes(x =  Timepoint, y = lac.max)) +    
  geom_boxplot() + geom_jitter() +
  labs(x = "Timepoint", y= "Maksimal laktat(mmol/l)",
       title = "Maksimal laktat")

 

```
